metadata.title: CVE-2018-1112 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: glusterfs server before versions 3.10.12, 4.0.2 is vulnerable when using'auth.allow' option which allows any unauthenticated gluster client toconnect from any network to mount gluster storage volumes. NOTE: thisvulnerability exists because of a CVE-2018-1088 regression.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
